 Visualize COMPARISON SELECT department_name , job_id , sum(salary)  FROM departments JOIN jobs ON departments.department_id = jobs.department_id JOIN employees ON jobs.job_id = employees.job_id AND NOT (employees.salary > 12000 OR employees.salary < 8000 OR employees.commission_pct IS NULL) GROUP BY departments.department_id ORDER BY sum(salary) ASC BIN job_id BY job_id
